title: Can you remove odd alarm icon top right of Pixel 5 without cancelling alarm?
content:
The below odd alarm icon appears top right whenever an alarm is set - the only way I can remove it is by deleting the alarm, which I don't want to do as its my repeating morning alarm. I've moved from Pixel 3 running Android 11 and this icon did not appear on that phone. Can the alarm notification be removed? The fact it doesn't even look correct bugs me! 

I have attempted to install a 3rd party alarm app to circumvent this, and even when turning notifications off on the app the icon would reappear. Any suggestions?
